title: Senior Python Backend Engineer
description: We‚Äôre about to convince you that you need a new job‚Ä¶ and that you‚Äôve just found the perfect opportunity. We‚Äôre steadily growing, and we‚Äôre continuously looking to expand our team with experienced Python engineers.Join Reef Technologies and work on your own terms:  * Contribute from wherever you like ‚Äì we are fully remote.  * Pick your own working hours individually. We only hold ~2 calls per week.  * Work with dynamic startups from all over the world on the projects of your choice.  * Contribute to the decision-making process and influence the way we operate.  * Choose the projects you want to work on. We receive enough offers to only accept the ones that we like.Remuneration on a B2B contract:  * 45-70 USD per hour, or  * 7560-11760 USD a month if you do 40 hours per week    Flexible work schedule (measured by time tracker)Please apply via our company website link.Additional perks of working at Reef Technologies:  * We offer a stable position at an established company in a booming industry.  * All decision-makers, including the CEO, are Senior Python Engineers.  * We cover reasonable coworking space expenses.  * You‚Äôll be assigned a private assistant to save time on personal obligations.  * You‚Äôll get financial help to buy the necessary hardware.  * You‚Äôll work in a multicultural environment where everyone has a say.  * You‚Äôll get to use your English skills on an everyday basis.  * You‚Äôll get to take advantage of our flexible leave policy.And don‚Äôt forget that you‚Äôll be free to work wherever and whenever you want to. We believe that you‚Äôll do your part by independently taking the right decisions.Our only expectation timewise is for you to contribute around 30-40 hours per week, which we believe is optimal for sustainable full-time engagement in a remote setting. You‚Äôre free to distribute those hours throughout the week in the way that you find the most convenient, within reason.We want to ensure proper work-life balance and create an environment where you can focus on your code while at work, and on whatever brings you pleasure in your free time. That is why as one of our benefits we offer the services of a private assistant. Appointments, research, online shopping, and more ‚Äì you choose which tasks to pass on to your assistant.Expert Python engineer wantedDo you have at least 5 years of programming experience ‚Äì not necessarily professional ‚Äì including at least a year with Python? If so, you have probably written so much Python code in your life that at times you want to express your thoughts through list comprehensions. Thanks to your extensive experience, you can solve any problem that gets thrown at you, but that is not enough ‚Äì you come up with multiple solutions for every issue, and you always know how to choose the most Pythonic one.And that is all a good sign ‚Äì a sign that means you‚Äôre exactly the type of person that we‚Äôre looking for! If you‚Äôd like to see what it‚Äôs like to work with Python natives who all bring their long-standing expertise to the table, please get in touch. Spoiler alert: it‚Äôs great.We have good manners, though, so let us introduce ourselves first. Do you want to find out more about the company? We were hoping you‚Äôd ask.Get to know your future companyReef Technologies is a fully remote Python backend software house. We‚Äôre a small, agile, senior-only team. All of our current members have more than seven years of strong experience, so we don‚Äôt ever have anything urgent to fix. We only deliver stable solutions, as we have developed a system that has delivered more than a hundred challenging projects in the last three years. We‚Äôd like to improve it even further with you on the team.The demand for our work is extremely high, so we get to pick and choose the projects that we want to take on ‚Äì and the same goes for you. Before you get assigned to a project, you‚Äôll get a personal call from the CEO asking whether you‚Äôre interested in that particular task and if you don‚Äôt like it, we‚Äôll just get something else. That‚Äôs the beauty of having a sales team that greatly outperforms our delivery capacity.Let your code have a real impactAt Reef Technologies, we don‚Äôt have managers. Thanks to the group decision-making framework, Sociocracy 3.0, every member of the team can be sure that their opinion will be valued. (Check it out here, you‚Äôll wonder how you‚Äôd survived in traditional organizations until now!) Our CEO doesn‚Äôt only take care of sales, bureaucracy, and client relationships - he is also a programmer, so all of us really do work together and understand the job at hand.What type of projects would you work on? We mainly accept offers from startups and small-to-medium businesses from the US, the UK, and Canada. Some projects may only last a couple of hours, while others take even a few years for us to complete. There is one thing that you can be sure of, though - that it will always be your personal choice whether to work on a particular project or reject it. What would you have thought about these?  * financial data warehouse which aggregates over 31 000 time series into a few hundred charts for a fintech company from London  * graph data search/visualization system for auditors/investigators from Norway  * super scalable WAF optimized down to extremely low running costs for a client from Chicago, IL  * multisource cloud object synthesizer library for a storage provider from San Mateo, CA  * report generator/inventory tracker for an e-commerce/healthcare company from Canada  * k8s-based revenue optimizer for large private GPU compute clusters in North America  * paper product level tracker for toilet cleaners from Canada  * hydrant certification report generator for Australian plumbers  * multi-tenant hospitality management system for large properties in the US  * large scale information display system for retailers (international)We have already delivered those, but you can be sure we‚Äôve got even more exciting projects coming up in the future. All that without ever setting foot in an office. We have completed those projects ‚Äì and many more ‚Äì from the comfort of our own homes, from tropical beaches and from our favorite coffee shops. Some of us work early in the morning, others start off late in the night. Each of us is free to choose their own programming environment. We know our engineers are competent enough to organize their work and achieve top productivity in their own way. Do you think you'd enjoy this type of freedom? Become one of us and make the world a better place by delivering more than just lines of code.Please apply via our company website link.

title: Python NLP Developer
description: Tangible AI helps nonprofits and social businesses increase their impact and work smarter using custom AI-powered applications and chatbots.We are looking for a contract Python developer passionate about using their Python skills to contribute to open source projects that make the world a better place for everyone.‚ÄãYou will start with a 3-month remote part-time contract (20+ hours/week), with the potential to grow into full-time employment.We will get to know each other in a small (3-week part-time) paid project.‚Äã This role is for you if you... * Are passionate about social impact and open source* Love building applications that work reliably* Are eager to learn about Natural Language Processing and chatbots* Enjoy new challenges and picking up new skills and tools* Are enthusiastic about AI and how it can be used to build a better world.‚Äã In this role, you will... * Work with a global Agile team to build, deploy, and maintain Django web apps* Develop software and algorithms using Python* Learn new skills and best practices in machine learning and NLP* Use CI/CD pipelines to improve your productivity and the quality of your code‚Äã Potenial projects for you: * A math expression extraction PyPi package (`mathtext`)* An chatbot intent classification NLP algorithm* Education chatbots that assist children and young adults in countries around the world in various languages‚Äã Required skills* Great oral and written communication in English* 1 year or more of project-based Python experience* Personal or professional project in Natural Language Processing - highly preferred* Experience with Django and Gitlab CI/CD - a bonus* Problem solving skills and ability to learn independently* Ability to multi-task and handle numerous on-going projects simultaneously‚Äã Why join us? * We're a growing global company working with nonprofits and social businesses in 10 countries.* We work on problems that matter. Everyone on our team is exposed to the real-world challenges that social impact organizations face.* We will teach you everything we know. As part of the Tangible AI team you will be working directly under the supervision and mentorship of the company's founders providing you with the mentorship to succeed at Tangible AI and beyond.* Our commitment to transparency. Every consultant in Tangible AI is part of running the company and is exposed to all aspects of our operations. We encourage "spin-offs" that take our open source software and create new businesses.

Ready to cast your spell on the world of AI?You'll be our ideal candidate if you have:- A 2-year (or more) love affair with software developmentPython skills- At least some React (or similar framework) expertise- A burning passion for all things AI (robots are our friends, after all)- Good written English (you don‚Äôt have to make Shakespeare shed a tear of joy, but you have to be able to explain your ideas clearly)- The ability to fly solo or spread your wings in a team- Analytical prowess and problem-solving skillsExtra points for:- Experience working with ChatGPT API (or, as we like to call it, the digital oracle)Your epic quest will involve:- Collaborating with our fantastic team of developers, designers, and other tech gurus- Turning complex problems into elegant, magical solutions- Building and refining digital tools that will change the world (or at least make it a little bit cooler)- Continuously learning, growing, and laughing with us on this wild rideAre you ready to unleash your inner coding superhero and save the day? Apply now and let's write the future together!We offer:- A competitive salary, plus extra bonuses that'll keep you grooving- A 4-day working week (that's right, 3-day weekends - hello, work-life balance!)- 20 marvelous paid leave days per year (because even superheroes need to recharge their superpowers), plus another 20 sick days for when you're battling the not-so-epic Kryptonite cold (chicken soup not included).- A chance to sink your teeth into captivating projects and grow your awesomeness within our company- Gym membership to keep you fit, fabulous, and ready to conquer the world- Company-sponsored education related to your specialty, because we believe in nurturing your inner genius- A friendly, cheerful team that's bursting with good vibes and a top-notch corporate cultureAre you ready to embark on this wild ride? Apply now and let's make some AI magic happen together!

title: Django developer (Middle)
description: About the project European SaaS that helps to manage waste collection in the cities. Consists of web and mobile applications, as well as IoT part. The CTO manages a small Agile team of 10+ employees (back-end, front-end engineers, QA). This position supposes that you have the following knowledge and competencies:1. Software development experience(3+ years) with:- Python and Django;- GrapheneDB;- Celery- Unit testing.2. Knowledge of REST and experience working with REST APIs3. Communication skills in English (good writing and speaking)4. It would be nice to have experience with FastAPINote that a big part of the team is in GMT+2, so it is important to be available during their business hours. You will deal with and be responsible for:1. Develop, support, and maintain the back-end of web and mobile apps. 2. Take care of quality (code, test, business features, documentation) - everyone enjoys working with clean, readable code, so it is important to keep it such.3. Participate in code reviews - usually, it is cross-reviews in the team or reviews by a senior person.4. Communicate with internal and external teams - we‚Äôre in touch with great minds - inventive clients, and supportive colleagues!What PLANEKS offers:0. Fast and comfortable hiring process.1. 100% remote(even before the COVID) work opportunity and flexitime - choose working hours between 8:00-20:00.2. Manage your compensation $$$$ budget - Travel tickets, Work equipment, Health insurance, Software, Sport, Training.3. Salary paid in USD + tax compensation. Revision every 12 months. We want everyone to be confident in what tomorrow brings.4. Everything to provide a good rest. YES: Paid vacation, national holidays, sick leaves(and support in case of serious diseases). NO: overtime, work on weekends.5. Regular feedback, mentorship, code review. Friendly and professional team that supports you. Well, we're proud of how we handle that. So you can always count on us.6. Speaking clubs with a native speaker to constantly maintain your English level.7. No bureaucracy - transparent processes and flat management. Working remotely means keeping things as simple as possible to work efficiently.We propose something more significant than a job. PLANEKS means developing a new lifestyle for our colleagues and clients. So take your part in it!

title: Quantitative Analyst
description: We invite you to join the team of an American company. As a Quantitative Analyst, you will have a broad scope of responsibility that includes the design, development and test of models or processes to value positions and construct quantitative data (curves, volatility cubes, correlation matrices, etc.) or calculate market risk (VaR, greeks, etc.) in real-time across all asset classes including Crypto.What You‚Äôll Do:-Design and development of processes used for pricing positions and calculating market risk metrices for all asset classes (equity, credit, FX, fixed income, commodities, crypto, and their derivatives)- Write modern, clean, reusable, well tested source code in Python that scales and performs well across large distributed systems- Leverage SQL and Snowflake to analyze the model inputs or construct model inputsWhat Knowledge You Should Have:- Experience working on yield curves,- Understanding of financial derivatives, market conventions is a must- Risk management tools such as VaR, Monte Carlo, scenario analysis and P&L is preferred- 3-5 years‚Äô experience in large-scale Python development, (exp with Java Script, Perl, C++ is an advantage)  We offer:-Strong work ethic and highly motivated-Hybrid office-Location or relocation - Montreal, Canada- 25 Vacation days and 3 Personal days- Annual bonus and salary review- Health insurance

title: Senior Python Engineer
description: Svitla Systems Inc. is looking for a Senior Python Engineer for a full-time position (40 hours per week) in Ukraine. Our client is a European cybersecurity SaaS company whose mission is to develop the best protection capabilities against cyber attacks. The company, created in France, provides modern field-proven technologies to enable operational cybersecurity teams and service providers to neutralize cyber threats before impact. The company's founders have been recognized security professionals for over 15 years. Today, the client collaborators follow their vision and strategy and contribute to defensive cybersecurity in France and Europe.Requirements: - 3+ years of experience with Python.- Solid understanding of REST API development and experience in JSON and XML.- Commercial experience with 3d party services integration.Nice to have:- Familiarity with AWS or MS Azure cloud services.Responsibilities:The candidate will perform two main categories of tasks as part of the overall objective of increasing the integration catalog. These tasks don't require complex architectures or design patterns.Create/Upgrade/Fix Collectors- The client collects data from various third parties. The client needs to develop "cloud-to-cloud" collectors to offer this feature.- This task involves creating or upgrading resilient and performant API consumers and API actions.- It must be a Python script that leverages their publicly available SDK - Expected deliverable: a set of Python scripts that can be merged in the client‚Äôs public automation library repository.Create/Upgrade/Fix Parsers- Once the data is collected, the client must parse and normalize it.- This task consists in creating parsers to transform the data of a third party into the data model using the parsing technology.- A parser is a YAML file that defines how the third-party information is transformed to comply with the client‚Äôs data model.- Expected deliverable: a YAML transformations file along with tests and meta files.We Offer:- US and EU projects based on advanced technologies.- Competitive compensation based on skills and experience.- Annual performance appraisals.- Flexibility in workspace, either remote or in one of our development offices. - Comprehensive medical insurance including dental and massages.- Sport reimbursement program for onsite and online activities.- Support of a healthy lifestyle, compensation for running events.- Bonuses for recommendations of new employees.- Bonuses for article writing, public talks, other activities.- Personal loan budget available for long-term personnel.- 20 vacation days, 10 national holidays and sick leaves.- Maternity leave policy and family days off.- Full compensation for conferences, courses, English classes.- Free webinars, meetups and conferences organized by Svitla.- Gifts for birthdays, New Year, anniversaries, children and more.- Fun corporate celebrations and activities, regular lectures on various topics.- Awesome team, friendly and supportive community!

title: Middle Python developer
description: Requirements:‚Ä¢	2-3 years of experience writing effective Python code;‚Ä¢	Has experience using scientific Python libraries such as Pandas, Numpy, and Scipy;‚Ä¢	Has experience in web development, preferably using Flask or Django;‚Ä¢	Knows how to use Git and GitHub;‚Ä¢	Is an enthusiastic team-player with excellent communication and collaboration skills;‚Ä¢	Upper-intermediate English or higher.Nice to have:‚Ä¢	Knowledge of data analysis and visualization strategies;‚Ä¢	Experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript;‚Ä¢	Experience writing SQL queries for RDBMS like Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle;‚Ä¢	Experience with Linux operating systems;‚Ä¢	Experience with cloud technologies such as Amazon Web Services and Google Cloud Services;‚Ä¢	Has a portfolio demonstrating quality work using similar technologies.Responsibilities:‚Ä¢	Expand the capabilities of an internal R&D data aggregation and visualization tool for a diagnostic medical device client. No specific medical device product development experience is required.‚Ä¢	Implement various data visualizations as described by customer to chart scientific instrument performance and reliability information.About the project:Selux Diagnostics is a US-based biotech company that is revolutionizing precision diagnostics for infectious diseases. Their mission is to confront the global threat of antimicrobial resistance through rapid antibiotic susceptibility testing (AST) that will deliver fast, personalized therapies for patients in need.Challenge:Antibiotic resistance is a global health crisis that is predicted to surpass deaths from cancer by 2050. Selux is addressing this problem and combating superbugs with their Next Generation Phenotyping (NGP) System, a rapid Antibiotic Susceptibility Testing (AST) system, that will transform patient care and personalized antibiotic therapies.Developing this system required heavy engineering work on custom laboratory robotic instruments as well as extensive effort developing the Site Software platform which ties together these instruments, the user, and the laboratory‚Äôs existing equipment and databases. With the instrument development underway, the only missing component for Selux was a software partner to augment their existing Site Software team to expand the capabilities within tight timelines.

title: Technical Lead
description: CompanyZoot is a global provider of cloud-based instant credit decisioning, risk management, loan origination, workflow and case management solutions. For more than 30 years our innovative tools and services have enabled Zoot clients ‚Äì leading banks, payment service providers, automobile and asset finance companies ‚Äì to meet and exceed their business objectives. Zoot enable their clients to adapt faster than their peers to successfully seize market opportunities. Zoot‚Äôs clients benefit from unrivalled reliability via a highly scalable private cloud-based service that processes billions of real-time decisions annually.Responsibility‚Ä¢ Technical leadership and mentorship of agile delivery teams‚Ä¢ Champion software development best practices, e.g DRY, POLA, TDD etc and ensure quality of code‚Ä¢ Plan and estimate technical tasks‚Ä¢ Guide teams through technical issues and challenges‚Ä¢ Overall design, implementation and deployment of large-scale mission-criticalSaaS architectures comprising of (but not limited to):‚Ä¢ Re-usable and configurable design patterns and microservices‚Ä¢ Complex relational and non-relation database schemas‚Ä¢ Complex Third-party API integrations‚Ä¢ Responsive HTML5 web applications‚Ä¢ Secure RESTful or SOAP APIs‚Ä¢ Support QA with complex automated testingKnowledge / Skills‚Ä¢ Experience in system integration, server side and client side‚Ä¢ Good understanding of data / messaging formats, such as XML, JSON, CSV‚Ä¢ Good understanding of standard API communication protocols, such as XML-SOAP, REST‚Ä¢ Good understanding of encryption methods, such as PGP, TLS, XML-DSig etc.‚Ä¢ Good understanding of different authentication methods, such as OAuth, JWT,maTLS etc.‚Ä¢ Experience in front-end web development e.g. responsive design, media rules andbreakpoints, CSS, SCSS, Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS.‚Ä¢ Good understanding of the HTML5 DOM‚Ä¢ Understanding of the WebSocket protocol‚Ä¢ Good understanding of JavaScript / JQuery. Knowledge of Node.js is welcomed. ‚Ä¢ Experience in Database development, relational and document based, performance optimisation‚Ä¢ Scripting experience with Python‚Ä¢ Good understanding of the Linux Shell, SSH, SCPPersonal Profile‚Ä¢ Experience leading team of developers‚Ä¢ Computer science degree or similar‚Ä¢ Basic business process analysis and business process design skills‚Ä¢ Experience in using MS Excel, Word, Visio‚Ä¢ Conscientious working style with emphasis on quality‚Ä¢ Experience in risk management and/or in the financial services industrypreferred but not essential‚Ä¢ Advanced EnglishZoot Offers‚Ä¢ Know-how, professionalism and an international market leading reputation‚Ä¢ Interesting and challenging international clients and projects‚Ä¢ Highly-motivated, highly-qualified team of friendly colleagues‚Ä¢ Flexible working schedule‚Ä¢ 21 days of paid vacations and flexible sick leave‚Ä¢ Coverage of relevant certifications and professional events‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and a high-quality working environment‚Ä¢ We have a new, comfortable office in the Lviv city center (of course, workingfrom home as needed)

title: Senior Python
description: We are a leading global product engineering and digital services company that unites 4000+ seasoned professionals globally on various projects in healthcare, fintech, travel, sportswear, entertainment, and security. Ciklum delivers high-impact technology solutions to Fortune 500 and fast-growing organizations worldwide.About the role:As a Senior Developer, become a part of a cross-functional development team working for our Client.About the Project:We are the team who is responsible for creating and maintaining self-service tools for data transformation, egress, discovery, visualization, and playground. As a team we do not build data pipelines, instead, we offer our users software that is used to build those pipelines. Our mission is to enable all JET employees to be self-sufficient with data so that data-driven decisions can be made quickly and easily.We are looking for a senior engineer, who would be able to work independently or with minimal supervision, they would also need to keep an eye on stakeholder‚Äôs queries and assist them.Responsibilities:We are using Python as our main programming language, though there would be possibilities to utilise Javascript or Scala skills if the candidate has any or wants to learn them. There's a huge data migration happening now in the company as two Data departments merge, so it would be an extraordinary experience to participate in this process for such a big tech giant.Requirements:We are happy with at least a few years of senior experience.Experience with:The ideal candidate has experience with PythonSQLKubernetesApache AirflowDBT, such Google Cloud services as BigQueryGKE, CloudFunctions, Dataflow, Service Accounts, Pub/Sub, Cloud Storage.Worked with PostgreSQL, Prometheus, Grafana, Jenkins, PagerDuty, Helm charts, Flask, and Javascript/React.They should also be a solid engineer, understand and follow software development principles, be comfortable with writing tests, be able to write documentation, communicate with the stakeholders and mentor less senior members of the team.Desirable:Be comfortable with at least one of the following technologies: Apache Airflow, DBT, Kubernetes, or BigQuery. Ability to learn, own their code, do pairing sessions with the other team members as well as work on their own.What`s in it for you?Care: your mental and physical health is our priority. We ensure comprehensive company-paid medical insurance, Mental Health programs, as well as financial and legal consultationsTailored education path: boost your skills and knowledge with our regular internal events (meetups, conferences, workshops), Udemy license, language courses, and company-paid certificationsGrowth environment: share your experience and level up your expertise with a community of skilled professionals, locally and globallyFlexibility: choose how you want to work ‚Äì 100% remote or on-site in our offices. Just don‚Äôt miss your regular team stand-upOpportunities: we value our specialists and always find the best options for them. title: Senior Full Stack Developer (Python)
description: We are seeking a Senior Full-Stack Developer to join our team and work on Project Phoenix. The ideal candidate will have expertise in Python, FastAPI, Flask, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, JS, Jinja2, React, and Webpack. While React and Webpack are not currently being used for thefrontend, there are plans to rewrite the application using React in the future.Responsibilities: Work with the team to design, develop, and maintain the web application. Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code. Collaborate with designers to create user-friendly interfaces. Build and maintain the backend using Python, FastAPI, and Flask. Develop and maintain the database using PostgreSQL. Write efficient and secure front-end code using HTML, CSS, JS, and Jinja2. Collaborate with the team to plan and execute the transition to React for the frontend. Use Webpack to manage dependencies and bundle assets. Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices. Continuously learn and stay up-to-date with new technologies and techniques.Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. Minimum of 5 years of experience as a Full-Stack Developer. Expertise in Python, FastAPI, Flask, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, JS, Jinja2, React, and Webpack. Strong understanding of web development principles and best practices. Experience with version control systems such as Git. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Ability to work independently and in a team environment. Excellent communication skills in both Russian and English. If you are passionate about web development and have expertise in the required technologies, please apply to join our team and work on Project Phoenix.

title: Senior Python/Django Engineer
description: Apexive is a premier software studio that creates top-notch technology for startups.We have a remote-first culture, and this position can be based anywhere. We encourage you to work in the way that best suits you. The company is led by a software architect (the founder actually codes), so you‚Äôll never feel like a cog in the machine. Everyone has the chance to make decisions that steer the company as a whole.While we are technology agnostic and believe in using the right tools for a given challenge, we are experts in cutting-edge frameworks and platforms, such as Flutter/Dart, Google Cloud Platform/AWS/Kubernetes, Python/Django, and Terraform, to name very a few. This is a full-time position.For this role, we are considering candidates who are remote-based. Apexive offers different work modes to meet the variety of needs and preferences of our team. Learn more about our engineering philosophies, tools, and some of the challenges we‚Äôve been solving on our Engineering blog.What You‚Äôll DoReporting directly to the CTO, this role will be responsible for:- Develop and maintain Backend solutions using Python/Django- Build docker images that can run on top of AWS or other PaaS- Model databases using MySQL, Postgres, DynamoDB- Understand the needs of our clients and come up with solutions for their problems- Taking an active part in our learning and knowledge-sharing cultureSkills We‚Äôre looking for:Please note this is a senior role- 4+ years of Python/Django experience- Experience with RESTful backend applications, specially built with Django- An inability to write anything but clean, maintainable code.- Strong aversion to hard code- Experience with deployment processes like AWS, Heroku- Being up-to-date with the latest news and technologies about the Backend- High English proficiency as our company language is English- Ability to work independently- Alignment with our values, including get things done attitudeWe‚Äôre looking for people who are passionate about building tech for startups and do not afraid of challenges!Nice to have:- UI/UX feeling- Docker, CircleCI- Terraform, Odoo- Basic knowledge of frontend- Contributions to open-source projectsPerks& Benefitsüí∞ Competitive compensationüìà Equity optionsüíª Work with the latest tech stack and top startups from various industriesüèñÔ∏è Offsite week in Thailand full of adventures ‚Äî all expenses paidüß≥ Flexible work hours and truly remote work cultureüßó‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Work From Anywhereüë´ Mentorship program ‚Äî get a mentor and become oneüìö Conferences, meetups, language lessons, and seminars to support personal growthOur Hiring Process1. Apply and share a fragment of your recent code using Bloc/Cubit and any other modern libraries (such as reactive_forms, firebase, etc.) that you are proudest of. Please note that it should be the specific project/repository, not just your whole GH/GL profile. We would really appreciate it if you could take this step seriously, as we base our decision on moving forward with the candidate solely on what you send us, and we do not give a benefit of the doubt at this stage.If this code is in the private repository, please share access rights with adar2378 (Frontend lead) or eugapx (Backend lead)2. Cultural fit interview (up to 30 minutes)3. Technical discussion (up to 1 hour)4. Technical take-home test assignment (up to 2-3 hours)5. Review of the take-home assignment (up to 1 hour)Welcome aboard!

title: Python Team Lead
description: SoftConstruct Ukraine is a large product company with Armenian roots.We develop solutions in the fields of Big Data, Data Science and CryptoExchange. We combine our expertise in iGaming software development with advanced technologies to develop original software such as sports statistics, risk analysis, security. In most cases, we deal with atypical projects for the market, try to find and generate new technology-based solutions in our field.We support our colleagues who actively participate in all spheres of our country‚Äôs defense, as well as help in the development of solutions, technical security support ‚Äî the information sector of the state. We are ready to offer work for IT specialists who need it.If you are looking for a Leading role in Python specialization and have relevant experience we would be more than happy to offer you our position of Python Team Lead.About the project and team:Data Platform that delivers the performance, simplicity, concurrency and affordability for data collecting, rapid analytics, and extracting data-driven insights for business users.Lambda architecture, designed to handle massive quantities of data by taking advantage of both batch and stream-processing methods. This approach to architecture attempts to balance latency, throughput, and fault-tolerance by using batch processing to provide comprehensive and accurate views of batch data, while simultaneously using real-time stream processing to provide views of online data.In many organisations, data consumption processes for timely reporting or crucial analytical requirements are hindered by both delays in query execution and information presentation. Main challenge is to minimize decision delay with the help of flexible solutions with open and simplified architecture and high performance based on future oriented technologies using AI models and forecasting analytics.In numbers:Up to 1 PB of data from 500+ partners in long-term storage30+ M new records dailyLatency for insight based on data delivery time (5 sec)Technical Stack:Kafka (KSQL, Streams), Kafka Connect, Google Cloud as Cloud Hadoop, Google Dataflow (Apache Beam), BigQuery, SQL, Kubernetes, Java/Python, Apache AirflowNice to haves:- Knowledge of Data Warehouse concepts;- Experience with Data visualization/Business Intelligence tools;- Experience with designing, implementing RESTful API‚Äôs (Aiohttp, FastAPI);- Some experience in any Big Data technologies (MapReduce, Spark, Presto, Drill...);- Some experience in any Graph databases (Neo4j, AgensGraph);- Some experience with IoC Tools (Terraform, Ansible);- Some experience working with Workflow tools (such as Apache Airflow);- Some experience with near real-time data processing.Main responsibilities:- Lead an agile team to success;- Ensure team high performance and meet delivery goals with superb quality;- Mentor each team member and lead them to excellence;- Write code to implement tasks and do code reviews;- Design solutions for new application components and work closely with the Head of Engineering (Python) on high level design tasks;- Work closely with PM, DevOps, IT and other teams to achieve your goals.What can we offer you:- Annual leave: 20 working days per year;- All paid sick days with a doctor‚Äôs note (no limit on the number of times. But for 1 time it is paid up to 2 weeks);- Registration in any format within DiiaCity at the employee‚Äôs choice (Employment contract, Gig-contract);- Individual English classes at EnglishDom online school (compensation within 50% of the amount of expenses);- 450 ‚Ç¨ year budget for training (and,or) sports (compensation within 50% of the amount of expenses) after probationary period;- Free health insurance after probationary period.

title: Python Engineer
description: ABOUT CLOUDMADEOver the next 10 years the auto industry will see more dramatic changes than the last 100 years combined. Central to this disruption is the role that software and design are playing to define every aspect of the creation, development, use and sales of cars and transportation services.Today, CloudMade is an expert in the design, development and delivery of artificial intelligence based solutions for the automotive industry and we are dedicated to delivering CloudMade‚Äôs promise of excitement through simplicity. With over 70 PoCs completed, 8 OEM customers spanning North America, UK, France, Germany and Japan, CloudMade has global ambitions and a global footprint to match.Driven by fantastic products, the latest technology and outstanding people, CloudMade has developed a business and a culture which match the huge ambitions of the company. In 2016 CloudMade announced a major strategic investment from Valeo to grow their business further, strengthen existing product lines and launch new ones. YOUR MISSIONWe are looking for a Python Engineer to become a core member of our product development team working on CloudMade products and solutions for the automotive industry and integrating those into customer‚Äôs systems.ABOUT THE ROLE‚Ä¢	Work closely with data science team and help them to develop highly optimized code for data processing and Machine Learning (ML).‚Ä¢	Work on a ML framework which is used by the CloudMade‚Äôs data science team and customer teams. Work on the next major release focused on the production use. Design the architecture for the new features.‚Ä¢	Develop backend REST services used in PoC projects by mobile applications. Design such services from scratch. Work closely with product team to identify the requirements.‚Ä¢	Research and experiment with various prototypes to support the pre-sales process and PoC projects. e.g. develop Alexa skills, work with smart home IoT devices and their integration.‚Ä¢	You will have flexibility to experiment with new libraries and technologies and use them for the projects.ABOUT YOUQualifications & Experience‚Ä¢	Upper-intermediate level in spoken and written English‚Ä¢	Solid knowledge of Python 3 and its ecosystem‚Ä¢	Experience with web frameworks both sync and async (Flask, FastAPI, Aiohttp)‚Ä¢	Experience working with ML libraries: pandas, scipy, scikit-learn, etc‚Ä¢	Experience with Relational Databases and SQL (PostgreSQL)‚Ä¢	Experience with Test frameworks (py.test, Tavern)‚Ä¢	Experience with Docker‚Ä¢	Hands-on experience with Git‚Ä¢	Understanding of Software Design, OOP, data structures and algorithms‚Ä¢	Understanding of REST API design principles‚Ä¢	Team playing attitude as well as ability to work and research independentlyWould be a plus:‚Ä¢	Experience with AWS‚Ä¢	Experience with Apache Spark‚Ä¢	General understanding of the Hadoop stack‚Ä¢	Experience developing AWS Lambdas and Alexa Skills‚Ä¢	Experience working with parquet, ORC, avro file formats‚Ä¢	Experience working with spatial data (GeoJSON, shapely, Spatialite, PostGIS)‚Ä¢	Experience in developing scalable distributed systemsTHE PACKAGEWe offer a competitive package to the right candidate.

title: Sr. Python Developer
description: Are you ready to join an exciting, well-funded startup with a fun work environment and a friendly culture? Look no further than TrustPoint! We're on the hunt for a Sr. Software Engineer with extensive knowledge of the Python stack (Django, PostgresDB, etc.) and 5+ years of experience in commercial software development.We're looking for someone who loves to be challenged and wants to be part of a dynamic, innovative team. You'll have a sense of ownership of your work and will be responsible for creating high-quality software that hits high security, reliability, and performance levels.As a team member, you'll work on designing, building, and maintaining APIs, micro-services, and data pipelines. You'll also use Jira to track work and activities related to the development process, participate in code reviews, execute SPIKEs, and deliver detailed implementation plans. You'll be responsible for the coding, debugging, testing, documenting, supporting, and maintaining portions of software. You'll also help us spot deficiencies in the development process, adopt procedures, engineering practices, and environment configurations, and suggest improvements.We offer a competitive salary, 100% remote work, a flexible schedule, and a flat structure with no "bosses" and "subordinates." You'll have regular performance reviews, 1:1 coaching and career guidance, minimal bureaucracy and micromanagement, and regular corporate events and team buildings. Our work is fun and purposeful as we rethink risk management and payments for the $1.2T home construction market.To succeed in this role, you should have at least five years of experience developing software in a production environment, substantial experience with Python + Django, and experience developing SaaS and RESTful APIs. You should also have experience implementing Infrastructure as Code (IaC), creating and maintaining CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, and understanding the DevOps movement.We're a team of serial entrepreneurs with expertise combining AI/ML, banking, construction, and enterprise software. Founded in 2019, TrustPoint is backed by industry luminaries and venture funding. Join us today and help us reshape the future of risk management and payments in the home construction market!

title: Blockchain Developer for Cryptocurrency Arbitrage Bot
description: We are looking for a skilled Blockchain Developer to develop a bot for cryptocurrency arbitrage using flash loans. The successful candidate will need to have a basic understanding of blockchain technology, be proficient in coding in languages such as Solidity, JavaScript, and Python, and have knowledge of decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols such as Aave, Compound, and Uniswap. Additionally, the candidate will need to be familiar with various APIs, such as web3.js, to interact with the blockchain.The main responsibility of the Blockchain Developer will be to develop a bot that will automatically execute arbitrage trades using flash loans. The successful candidate will need to be familiar with the different types of orders and order types on various cryptocurrency exchanges, and understand the intricacies of flash loans and the associated risks in order to develop a bot that will be able to properly manage the associated risks.Requirements:- Understanding of blockchain technology- Proficient in coding in Solidity, JavaScript, and Python- Knowledge of decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols such as Aave, Compound, and Uniswap- Familiarity with various APIs, such as web3.js, to interact with the blockchain- Experience in developing bots - Familiarity with various cryptocurrency exchanges and different types of orders on those exchanges- Understanding of the intricacies of flash loans and associated risksIf you have a passion for blockchain technology and developing bots for cryptocurrency arbitrage, and meet the above requirements, we would love to hear from you!

title: Senior / Lead Technical Support Developer
description: Job Summary:As a Tier 3 Support Engineer, you will be responsible for resolving complex technical issues escalated from Tier 1 and Tier 2 support teams. You will work closely with customers, software developers, and other technical support engineers to provide timely and effective solutions to issues related to our products and services. You will also be responsible for troubleshooting, analyzing, and resolving software and platform issues, as well as identifying root causes and providing recommendations for long-term solutions.Key Responsibilities:Provide Tier 3 technical support for customers and internal teams- Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues related to software and systems- Work with Tier 1 and Tier 2 support teams to escalate issues as necessary- Collaborate with software developers and other technical support engineers to resolve issues and provide solutions- Analyze system logs and diagnostic data to identify and diagnose issues- Reproduce Issues identified at the customer‚Äôs site in order to identify the root cause- Develop and maintain technical documentation, including knowledge base articles and troubleshooting guides- Stay up-to-date with the latest technologies, industry trends, and best practices related to Tier 3 technical supportQualifications:- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field- 4+ years of experience in Tier 3 technical support or a related field- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills- Excellent English written and verbal communication skills- Experience with troubleshooting complex software and hardware issues- Experience with Cloud environments (Azure, GCP, AWS), Database Platforms (such as Oracle, Snowflake, Postgres), BigData Platforms (such as Databricks, Hadoop, Spark), and Docker/Kubernetes.- Familiarity with programming languages such as Java, Python- Knowledge of operating systems, databases, and networking protocols- Ability to work independently and in a team environment- Demonstrated ability to learn quickly and adapt to changing technologies and customer requirements.

title: Middle\Senior Backend Engineer ( Python)
description: Software Rocket is looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to join the ongoing project where you can contribute by freeing people from monotonous, compromising and repetitive tasks, making room for more versatile tasks and career opportunities.At SoftwareRocket we are committed to what really matters - the exceptional service and high quality of our products, providing our employees with everything they need to achieve great results, avoiding the waste of their personal time on intrusive communication and annoying corporate culture.If all of this resonates with you, we can't wait to see you become a part of our team!Our ExpectationsRequired- Track record of successfully designing, operating and monitoring service oriented architectures.- Git and Docker are essential parts of your tool belt and you are confident with Unix based systems.- Solid AWS knowledge especially around Serverless architectures.- Profound Python skills alongside experience with Django and Asynchronous networking via Asyncio.- Solid knowledge of different data structures and databases as well as knowing when to use which (Relational, Object stores, document databases, time series, key value stores, etc.).- Experience in API design (REST, GraphQL, (Web)Sockets, RPC, etc.).GREAT TO HAVE- A background in robotics or automation technologies.- You have knowledge around Node.js, TypeScript, Javascript and the many-faceted variety of modern front end technologies.- IaC experience with Terraform or Ansible.- Experience in AWS IoT and robotics services.- Experience with event or stream based communication using Kinesis, Kafka, or queueing tools like SNS, SQS, Celery, RabbitMQ, etc.Your Responsibilities- As part of an international, agile team your primary mission is to make interaction with robots as easy and intuitive as possible.- This involves all interactions from initial teaching to daily operations.- You play an active role in designing new solutions with product management and other stakeholders taking ownership of technical feasibility and execution.- You feel accountable for the success and the flawless operation of your products and act decisively and autonomous should any incidents occur.- In regular consultation with customers, product management and other departments you measure and validate the utility and customer satisfaction of your work.- As a senior team member you take an active role in improving internal quality measures and processes as well as holding yourself and others accountable to adhere to them- With great pleasure and talent you share your knowledge with junior team members and act as a role model and mentor.What We Offer- completely remote work;- a responsible team of senior level specialists driven by the delivering of quality results;- many projects, which allows you to switch in between in the future to improve your skills.

title: Computer Vision Engineer
description: About us: Tangiblee (Chicago, USA) is creating Augmented Reality (AR) solutions for e-commerce that are utilized by millions of online shoppers worldwide. Our client base includes renowned brands like Fossil, Pandora, Coach, and many others. We are a remote first and geek-friendly team of professionals.Our solutionWith Tangiblee's AR solution, retailers can create a more engaging and personalized shopping experience for their customers. Our technology allows shoppers to visualize size, virtually try-on various items, and even furnish their apartments online, leading to happier and more satisfied customers. By combining the online and offline shopping experience, Tangiblee AR is transforming the way people shop and ultimately improving the overall shopping experience.RequirementsThe ideal candidate should have:A minimum of 2 years of commercial experience in a related fieldThe ability to work independently with minimum supervision, as well as thrive in a collaborative team environmentTechnical expertise in Python, as well as knowledge of any other programming language is a plusStrong knowledge of Computer Vision fundamentals and classical image processing algorithmsProficiency with numpy, scipy, OpenCV, TensorFlow, and PyTorchExperience with segmentation (semantic, instance, panoptic) is highly desiredA proven ability to design and implement complex algorithms, and be analytical and creative in a problem-solving environmentA solid understanding of machine learning techniques, including data collection, training, evaluation, and iterative improvementsA Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or a related fieldStrong communication and presentation skillsAt least an intermediate level of English proficiencyResponsibilitiesWe're currently seeking a skilled Computer Vision engineer to augment our team's capabilities and expand our product's existing functionalities to include new product categories.Your key responsibilities will involve:- Utilizing Machine Learning and Computer Vision technology to address real-world issues for our market-ready product.- Actively contributing to business development and growth by presenting innovative and unconventional concepts.- Demonstrating your work to colleagues.- Working closely with other techies, such as software engineers, data scientists, and product managers, to make sure that Computer Vision solutions meet the product's requirements and help the business grow.- Keeping up with the latest research and trends in Computer Vision and Machine Learning, and using this knowledge to make our product even better and more awesome!

title: Back End Developer

title: Senior Software Engineer (Backend), Voice Services
description: We are Data Science UA and we are developing a Data Science community in Ukraine. Data Science UA unites all researchers, engineers, and developers around Data Science and related areas. We conduct events on machine learning, computer vision, intelligence, information science, and the use of artificial intelligence for business in various fields. We are helping one of our clients to build an R&D team in Ukraine and hire the best talents for one of the top Sales platforms with AI assistance.The RoleMaking and receiving voice calls are a key components of the Outreach product offering. Outreach customers complete many calls with their prospects on our voice platform on a daily basis. The Voice Services team is hiring software engineers to increase the momentum in this space. If you have experience in building high availability voice communication systems with open source real-time communication software and commercial communications platform APIs, we‚Äôd love to talk to you about this opportunity. Real-time system development is a little different from other web development. The features we build are inherently heavy on state, complex in workflow, and include extensive third-party integrations. You‚Äôll have to be creative, build on top of a lot of existing technology, and stay focused on Outreach‚Äôs core value proposition of revenue efficiency. You‚Äôll be building systems to ensure calling is simple, reliable, and crystal clear; so that our customers can reduce the time on clicking around or performing repetitive actions and focus on what matters most - interacting with their prospects.Daily Adventuresüîπ Working with commercial CPaaS APIs and open-source real-time communication software to manage calls, messages, and security.üîπ Finding ways to engineer high availability into a system that has lots of moving parts, not all of which are directly under your control.üîπ Working with stakeholders to make sure our customers have the tools they need to be successful on our platform.üîπ Finding quick ways to prototype and test possible solutions to large problems.üîπ Looking up and down the stack for the best return on investment for any given pain point.üîπ Working on one of the most visible parts of Outreach‚Äôs product - to both our customers and the rest of our organization.Basic Qualificationsüîπ 6 + years of experience building back-end services and shipping production quality code in Java, Go or C++, along with strong software engineering skills.üîπ Proven technical and project leadership skills and able to guide and mentor others.üîπ Experience with cloud-based service applications and continuous-deployment projects.üîπ Willing to go above and beyond to help other team members.üîπ Ability to prioritize details along a path of iterative delivery.üîπ Ability to quickly ramp up new technologies and start contributing.üîπ Experience with diagnosing real-time media quality issues (plus).üîπ Experience with VoIP, specifically using WebRTC and SIP to facilitate real-time communication between users and with phone numbers across the globe (plus).About the TeamOn the Voice Services team they:- Own features end-to-end, from the customer need all the way to the back-end implementation.- Are highly collaborative and distribute technical leadership throughout the team.- Do Agile development, with Sprints and regular retrospectives.- Function in a highly progressive, quick-iteration environment focused on delivering consistent, incremental customer value.- Have something new to demo every week!We‚Äôre currently shoring up the core functionalities of our telecom product. In the long term we want to give customers the same edge with calling and messaging that they have with email: the ability to optimize and constantly improve how they interact with customers. We will face new challenges as we continue to scale out to ten times the volume of calling we have today and beyond. These efforts present a diverse gamut of work that will help enhance Outreach‚Äôs competitive edge by making our customers more effectively.

This computation stack will also create an AI model to process data at the edge.Software Engineer Responsibilities:üîªDevelop and maintain software related to the deployment and management of bare metal servers in a cloud environment.üîªSupport test and deployment of new products and features.Qualifications:üîªExperience in building cloud services related to the provisioning and management of computing resources.üîªKnowledge of docker containers and Kubernetes technologies.üîªWe expect K8S experience including Kubeegee, Clusterapi, Docker, and Cloud Formation as a core skill. Related programming skills are expected to be able to write scripted code (Python and Go preferred).üîª3+ years of relevant work experience.üîªExpertise in any of these Python, Golang.Benefits:üîª Paid vacation, sick leave (without sickness list);üîª Official state holidays ‚Äî 11 days considered public holidays;üîª Professional growth while attending challenging projects and the possibility to switch your role, master new technologies and skills with company support;üîª Flexible working schedule: 8 hours per day, 40 hours per week.üîª Personal Career Development Plan (CDP);üîª Employee support program (Discount, Care, Heals, Legal compensation);üîª Paid external training, conferences, and professional certification that meets the company‚Äôs business goals;üîª Internal workshops & seminars;üîª Corporate library (Paper/E-books) and internal English classes.Working conditions:Overlap till 10 am PSTWe offer a competitive salary package and benefits, and the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. If you are a self-motivated, detail-oriented individual with a passion for networking and SDN, we would love to hear from you.

title: Full Stack Developer (Python,React) Miami location
description: We're a startup company that's revolutionizing the world of medicine through computational simulation. We're looking for a talented Full Stack Developer to join our early-stage team and help us build cutting-edge software that will change the way medicines are developed and tested.As a Full Stack Developer, you'll be responsible for developing both the backend and frontend of our applications using Python and React. We're looking for someone who is independent, creative, and excited about working in a startup environment.Responsibilities:Develop and maintain backend services and APIs using Python and related frameworks (Django, Flask, etc.)Design and implement responsive, user-friendly frontend interfaces using React and related libraries (Redux, etc.)Collaborate with other developers, designers, and product owners to deliver high-quality softwareWrite clean, efficient, and testable codeEnsure code quality by writing unit and integration testsIdentify opportunities to improve our software and processes, and take the initiative to implement those improvementsExperience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services such as Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, and Cloud SQL.Experience with Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) tools such as Jenkins, TravisCI, or CircleCI.Requirements:Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer with a focus on Python backend development and React frontend developmentStrong knowledge of Python and related frameworks (Django, Flask, etc.)Experience with frontend development using React and related libraries (Redux, etc.)Familiarity with RESTful APIs and microservices architectureGood understanding of database systems (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc.)Familiarity with agile methodologies and version control tools (Git, etc.)Excellent problem-solving and communication skillsA strong desire to work in a startup environment and contribute to building a successful companyExperience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services such as Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, and Cloud SQL.Experience with Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) tools such as Jenkins, TravisCI, or CircleCI.We offer a highly competitive salary, flexible work schedule, and the opportunity to work on groundbreaking software that will make a real difference in the world. If you're a self-motivated developer with a passion for innovation, we want to hear from you!

title: Software and MLOps Engineer (Python)  (Warsaw)
description: The first of start-ups kind to successfully save the bees, at scale, and by that secure the global food supply.We do this by deploying Machine Learning, AI, precision robotics, and state-of-the-art and hardware designs.Everybody wants to make an impact at work. But wouldn‚Äôt it be great to know that you weren‚Äôt just contributing to the success of your company‚Äîbut the world as a whole?The company is probably the coolest most impactful start-up you haven't (yet) heard of. The first of its kind to successfully save the bees, at scale, and by that secure the global food supply. We do this by deploying Machine Learning, AI, precision robotics, and state-of-the-art software and hardware designs.We use React.js and React Native on the front, node.js and AWS on the back, and many new and cool stuff in between. We work in a fun, dedicated, and constantly improving environment.ImpactOur company is probably the easiest to sell in terms of impact and "do good" - we are saving the world - for real.Our product, is the only solution for a critical global issue - the extinction of the honey bee, which is responsible for most of our nutrition.For example - most fruits and vegetables will not grow without bees' pollination. Same for coffee, cotton, and food for the animals we eat.In terms of personal impact - we put a high emphasis on the ability of our employees to impact inside and outside of their team. The business is transparent to everyone, and everyone has a say and can make a change.TechnologyWe have no legacy code. We strive to use the newest technologies and practices and are always looking for how to make things even better than accustomed. Each person has end-to-end responsibility for his tasks and direct communication with all the different interfaces involved.The companyThe company is four years old and raised over $100M. We have raised one of the largest investment rounds in ag-tech history.The company grew from 15 people to over 100 in the last year. The rapid growth only begins.We have great plans for the Warsaw site (currently one person, and I visit often). The first people there will have an opportunity to become a part of the root team of something future to be very big.Technical skills:At least 1 year of OOP Python.At least 1 year as an MLOps or 2 years as a DevOps.Experience in designing and implementing software infrastructure.High level of written and spoken English. Advantages:DVC TensorFlow‚Äôs data loadersML experiment systemsAWS AthenaSoft skills:We are looking for people who are passionate about what they do. Initiative people who strive for finding creative, simple solutions to complex problems.You should be able to have end-to-end ownership of your responsibilities, and communicate with multiple interfaces across the company while being an extraordinary team player. And one more thing, you should be a lean-thinker.ConditionsThe positions are in-office. We do not offer a hybrid format, but we d offer extreme flexibility.People may choose to work from home when necessary, but not on a regular basis.We have an unlimited vacation policy, we do not count hours, and each person can arrive and leave whenever suitable (within reason).In the future, we are planning to add additional benefits.LegalThe candidates will sign a B2B contract with our Polish partner who is doing the employment (payroll and legal) for us.

title: Python Developer for Automotive Project
description: Luxoft is one of the major software services companies world-wide. We deliver professional software services in multiple business verticals such as finance, automotive, and digital transformation. Supporting large vehicle manufacturers in the area of development, production and aftersales is Luxoft's ambition.The software inside a vehicle was traditionally expected to be a very controlled and self-contained environment. Equipping cars with perception and machine intelligence changes a lot in the overall picture of the vehicle manufacturer. LUXOFT's goal is to empower our customers, with deep domain knowledge and smart solutions, to develop cars of the future. Great mechanical engineering is not the only criteria anymore for delivering the best cars in the world. Using state of the art software technologies are key to provide the requested user experience.For the development of state of the art middleware software components for the future autonomous vehicle generation of a premium German car manufacturer, we are searching for experienced Test engineers to join our international team.In the context of the development of the next car architecture this automotive SW development project will gain a central role in the client's EE Architecture.The subject of this specific project is the development of a software platform for the next generation of the client's autonomous driving system. This includes software engineering and software development activities for platform functionalities and systems functions of the SW Platform.System Functions in this terms are all open and proprietary functions which are‚Ä¢ necessary for E/E integration into a vehicle: e.g. programming, diagnostics, coding, vehicle clock/time sync management, service discovery, communication via standard links like ethernet etc.‚Ä¢ necessary as a supplemental function: e.g. logging of data to external logger boxes (tracing), debugging capabilities (e.g. via JTAG)‚Ä¢ necessary for internal operation of the system, e.g. process management, CPU/RAM/Flash quota management, scheduling‚Ä¢ necessary for the safe operation (e.g. ASIL requirements, watchdogs, diagnostic monitors)‚Ä¢ necessary for the secure operation (e.g. HSM configuration, secure boot concepts for all relevant SoCs etc.)The software platform is based on an QNX operating system, which hosts a commercial Adaptive AUTOSAR stack including OEM specific functionalities for‚Ä¢ programming‚Ä¢ diagnostics‚Ä¢ coding‚Ä¢ vehicle clock/time sync management‚Ä¢ service discovery‚Ä¢ logging‚Ä¢ process management, CPU/RAM/Flash quota management, scheduling‚Ä¢ safety and security functionalities like certificate management, HSM configuration, secure boot, etc.The software stack developed within this project shall be deployable to different underlying hardware platforms. The initial launch of this software stack is currently targeted for July 2025.Responsibilities:- Implement Python application for both frontend and backend - Work with REST API to provide services for other applications in the same system - Implement, execute and document test cases in alignment with the requirements- Prepare test reports- Setup release process, quality checks, etc.- Configurate and integrate the ECU Test into HW setup (ECU Test, Python)- Integrate tests into the CI environment; implement scripts to trigger tests from within the CI and for fetching test execution results- Implement the job templates in Zuul for check and gate test- Concept and implementation of repository for harmonized SW modules; implement a central set of SW modules that will be extended step by step- Design, implement and maintain safety-related HIL development test benches- Work on a solution that can be used for booking HIL test bench resources, e.g., for manual testing (Python, Java)- Support in setting up HW infrastructure / DevOps- Support developers to track the bugs, problem areas, verify bug fixesMandatory Skills Description:- Minimum 3 years experience in Python- As a frontend developer using Python, you should have a strong understanding of the Python language and its syntax. Proven expertise in advanced python programming is a must. - Familiarity with web frameworks: You should be familiar with web frameworks such as Flask, Django, or Pyramid, which allow you to build web applications using Python. - Familiarity with frontend frameworks: You should have experience working with frontend frameworks such as React, Vue.js, or Angular, which are commonly used for building complex user interfaces. - Knowledge of REST APIs: As mentioned earlier, REST APIs are commonly used for communication between the frontend and backend of web applications. You should have a good understanding of how REST APIs work and how to consume them using Python. - Experience with version control systems: Version control systems such as Git are essential for collaborating with other developers and maintaining code over time. - Attention to detail and problem-solving skills: As a frontend developer, you need to pay attention to detail and be able to solve complex problems related to user interface design, user experience, and web application performance. - Knowledge of test automation frameworks and its ideology- Academic degree in computer science, electrical engineering, telecommunication engineering or similar qualification- CI / tooling skills: Git, bash scripting, Docker and build automation- Good understanding of the software development lifecycle, ideally along with agile principles- Strong focus on producing well-tested, clean and maintainable code- Open to learn new tech and adjust to new ways of working- Good communication skills in English (writing & speaking) along with team spirit- Self-organized and diligent- Enthusiasm for automotive- Attention to detail and problem-solving skillsNice-to-Have Skills:- ASPICE- Experience with C, C++ embedded development, Python- Experience in AUTOSAR based software development is an advantage- Experience in working in cross functional area with real end-to-end product-Bazel test- Zuul- Ansible- QNX

Proven expertise in advanced python programming is a must. - Familiarity with web frameworks: You should be familiar with web frameworks such as Flask, Django, or Pyramid, which allow you to build web applications using Python. - Familiarity with frontend frameworks: You should have experience working with frontend frameworks such as React, Vue.js, or Angular, which are commonly used for building complex user interfaces. - Knowledge of REST APIs: As mentioned earlier, REST APIs are commonly used for communication between the frontend and backend of web applications. You should have a good understanding of how REST APIs work and how to consume them using Python. - Experience with version control systems: Version control systems such as Git are essential for collaborating with other developers and maintaining code over time. - Attention to detail and problem-solving skills: As a frontend developer, you need to pay attention to detail and be able to solve complex problems related to user interface design, user experience, and web application performance. - Knowledge of test automation frameworks and its ideology- Academic degree in computer science, electrical engineering, telecommunication engineering or similar qualification- CI / tooling skills: Git, bash scripting, Docker and build automation- Good understanding of the software development lifecycle, ideally along with agile principles- Strong focus on producing well-tested, clean and maintainable code- Open to learn new tech and adjust to new ways of working- Good communication skills in English (writing & speaking) along with team spirit- Self-organized and diligent- Enthusiasm for automotive- Attention to detail and problem-solving skills

title: Python Developer
description: We love cars and everything related to them, and we work in e-commerce. In 2008, our team started the business with several dozen parts positions, and today we sell about 3.7 million products for 166 car brands. We are real friends with clients from 27 EU and EEA countries. As of 2020, our customer base has reached 5.3 million active B2C and B2B clients. We are dedicated to working, and so we expect our revenue to exceed ‚Ç¨1.0 billion. We are seeking a talented Middle Python Developer to join our dynamic team. As a Middle Python Developer, you will be responsible for designing, deploying, and optimizing high-load API systems.About the project: The A/B testing team is responsible for providing infrastructure for conducting A/B testing in Autodoc. The infrastructure includes the full process of conducting tests: launching and registering tests, collecting data from the database on tests, analyzing results, and drawing conclusions on them for the main user segments.Key Responsibilities:Designing, developing, deploying, and optimizing high-load API systems for A/B testingBuilding user interfaces for business stakeholders using Python libraries such as StreamlitCommunicating with key stakeholders to collect requirements for new featuresCollaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure the reliability and scalability of the systemQualifications:2+ years of experience in Python developmentExperience with designing, deploying and optimization of high-load API using Fast APIUnderstanding of DevOps principlesFamiliarity with Python libraries for developing UI applications, particularly StreamlitUnderstanding of A/B testing terminologyNice to have:Experience with developing A/B testing platformsBachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related fieldWhat do we offer?For your professional growthOnly innovative projects and advanced technologiesComplete freedom for bright ideas and bold decisionsWork in the international team of professionals willing to share their experienceAbility to switch to another project that is interesting for youProfessional growth: free external and internal professional training courses and certificationsPaid business trips and payment for participation in conferencesPaid corporate language classes (English, German, Polish)For your convenienceWork on your terms ‚Äî you can work remotely and choose a flexible schedule28 paid vacation days, 1 day off, national holidays, and unlimited sick leaveFriendly team buildings, cool corporate events withCorporate wellness activities with colleaguesCorporate gifts on the first working day, birthday, anniversary of work, birth of a child Join us today and let‚Äôs create a success story together!

title: Senior Software Engineer (Backend), Voice Services
description: We are Data Science UA and we are developing a Data Science community in Ukraine. Data Science UA unites all researchers, engineers, and developers around Data Science and related areas. We conduct events on machine learning, computer vision, intelligence, information science, and the use of artificial intelligence for business in various fields. We are helping one of our clients to build an R&D team in Ukraine and hire the best talents for one of the top Sales platforms with AI assistance.The RoleMaking and receiving voice calls are a key components of the Outreach product offering. Outreach customers complete many calls with their prospects on our voice platform on a daily basis. The Voice Services team is hiring software engineers to increase the momentum in this space. If you have experience in building high availability voice communication systems with open source real-time communication software and commercial communications platform APIs, we‚Äôd love to talk to you about this opportunity. Real-time system development is a little different from other web development. The features we build are inherently heavy on state, complex in workflow, and include extensive third-party integrations. You‚Äôll have to be creative, build on top of a lot of existing technology, and stay focused on Outreach‚Äôs core value proposition of revenue efficiency. You‚Äôll be building systems to ensure calling is simple, reliable, and crystal clear; so that our customers can reduce the time on clicking around or performing repetitive actions and focus on what matters most - interacting with their prospects.Daily Adventuresüîπ Working with commercial CPaaS APIs and open-source real-time communication software to manage calls, messages, and security.üîπ Finding ways to engineer high availability into a system that has lots of moving parts, not all of which are directly under your control.üîπ Working with stakeholders to make sure our customers have the tools they need to be successful on our platform.üîπ Finding quick ways to prototype and test possible solutions to large problems.üîπ Looking up and down the stack for the best return on investment for any given pain point.üîπ Working on one of the most visible parts of Outreach‚Äôs product - to both our customers and the rest of our organization.Basic Qualificationsüîπ 6 + years of experience building back-end services and shipping production quality code in Java, Go or C++, along with strong software engineering skills.üîπ Proven technical and project leadership skills and able to guide and mentor others.üîπ Experience with cloud-based service applications and continuous-deployment projects.üîπ Willing to go above and beyond to help other team members.üîπ Ability to prioritize details along a path of iterative delivery.üîπ Ability to quickly ramp up new technologies and start contributing.üîπ Experience with diagnosing real-time media quality issues (plus).üîπ Experience with VoIP, specifically using WebRTC and SIP to facilitate real-time communication between users and with phone numbers across the globe (plus).About the TeamOn the Voice Services team they:- Own features end-to-end, from the customer need all the way to the back-end implementation.- Are highly collaborative and distribute technical leadership throughout the team.- Do Agile development, with Sprints and regular retrospectives.- Function in a highly progressive, quick-iteration environment focused on delivering consistent, incremental customer value.- Have something new to demo every week!We‚Äôre currently shoring up the core functionalities of our telecom product. In the long term we want to give customers the same edge with calling and messaging that they have with email: the ability to optimize and constantly improve how they interact with customers. We will face new challenges as we continue to scale out to ten times the volume of calling we have today and beyond. These efforts present a diverse gamut of work that will help enhance Outreach‚Äôs competitive edge by making our customers more effectively.
