title: QA Engineer (Performance testing)
description: Our ideal candidate At least 2 years of practical, hands-on experience in Performance testing; Advanced experience in Performance testing tools (such as JMetter, LoadRunner, Blazemetter, and Fiddler); Practical experience with XML, SQL, XPath, DB, and API; Experience in Object Oriented programming languages (Java/Python/C#/JavaScript); Experience in working with system logging tools (such as Splunk, Kibana, ElasticSearch); Experience in CI/CD (Jenkins etc.); Experience in setting up Performance testing Frameworks, and solutions; Experience in setting up Performance testing processes; Experience in building Performance Monitoring solutions (with custom or market tools such as - AppDynamics); Ability to troubleshoot and propose solutions for performance leakage areas.

title: Middle/Senior Python Software Developer (or switcher from another OOP language)
description: Job DescriptionWe are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Software Engineer with experience in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) languages, ideally Python, and strong knowledge of Relational Databases to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in cloud computing, DevOps, and GIS, as well as excellent communication skills in English. This is a fully remote position, with a focus on candidates located within the Ukraine-Israel timezone.Project OverviewOur client's project involves gathering and analyzing images using AI to assess the condition of buildings, with the goal of selling this data to insurance companies. As a Python Software Engineer on our team, you will contribute to the development and implementation of innovative solutions to support this project.Responsibilities* Develop high-quality software solutions using Python* Design, implement, and optimize relational databases, with a focus on PostgreSQL db* Work with GIS technologies and contribute to the project with GIS knowledge (if applicable)* Utilize AWS cloud computing services for application development and deployment* Implement DevOps best practices, including CI/CD pipelines and Kubernetes* Communicate effectively in technical English, both written and spoken; knowledge of Hebrew is a plus* Explain and justify technical solutions, demonstrating responsibility and proactive problem-solving skills* Contribute to setting up efficient processes within the teamRequirements* Strong proficiency in at least one OOP language, preferably Python; ability to demonstrate experience applying skills from other languages to Python if needed* Solid experience in designing and using relational databases, preferably PostgreSQL* Knowledge of GIS technologies is a significant advantage, and may impact compensation* Hands-on experience with AWS cloud computing services* Basic knowledge of DevOps, including CI/CD, Kubernetes, and experience with Linux tools, CLI, and the Linux ecosystem* Fluent in technical English, with strong communication skills; knowledge of Hebrew is a plus* Comfortable using tools such as Git, GitHub, and Bash* Ability to work remotely within the Ukraine-Israel (Kyiv) timezone* Experience in setting up processes and being proactive in a team environmentHiring process1. CV review2. 15-30 min intro interview 3. Technical interview about your background and skills 4. Final interview with the client

title: Quality Assurance Architect (Networking)
description: We are looking for a Quality Assurance Architect with in-depth knowledge of Python and strong understanding of networking technologies to join PLVision. Our ideal candidate should have profound experience working with enterprise-level software and performing advanced testing, both functional and non-functional.   As a Quality Assurance Architect, you will join our Architecture Office and play a crucial role in ensuring the quality of the innovative products we build for our customers, who value PLVision‚Äôs unique expertise in end-to-end networking software development. You will drive the design and implementation of test automation frameworks, with a focus on open-source networking operating systems and software. At PLVision, we foster lifelong learning, encourage initiative and recognize our experts‚Äô professional achievements. We offer numerous opportunities for professional growth in the company with in-demand and future-proof specialization in computer networking.Client profile  A world‚Äôs leading US-based networking equipment, networking software and switching ASIC (chip) vendor. Their networking products enable turnkey solutions for datacenter, ISP/telcom and enterprise clients. About PLVision We are a software product development company specializing in computer networking and embedded systems. PLVision has offices in Krakow, Poland, and in Ukraine: Lviv, Odesa, Kyiv, and Kharkiv (currently relocated). Founded in 2007, the company helps networking industry leaders and ambitious startups in the U.S., Israel, and the EU countries to launch innovative products. Vacancy responsibilities:‚Ä¢ Design and implement test automation frameworks for networking products, including switches, routers, smart NICs, and DPUs‚Ä¢ Develop and execute test plans for networking products to ensure they meet quality standards, including functional and non-functional requirements‚Ä¢ Collaborate with development teams to ensure that test automation is integrated into the development process and that issues are detected and addressed on time‚Ä¢ Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices for test automation and quality assurance in the networking industry‚Ä¢ Lead and mentor other members of the Quality Assurance and testing teams ‚Ä¢ Active involvement in open-source communities related to networking products‚Ä¢  Knowledge of market trends in the networking industry and ability to align test automation strategies with customer product needsVacancy requirements:‚Ä¢ 8+ years of experience in Software Testing and Quality Assurance with a focus on test automation and scripting ‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Python programming language and experience with other scripting languages‚Ä¢ Test automation frameworks and scripting languages such as pytest, Robot Framework and unittest ‚Ä¢ Experience of working in the networking industry, specifically with switches, routers, smart NICs and DPUs ‚Ä¢ Experience with open-source networking operating systems and software, such as SONiC, DENT, Linux, Open vSwitch and DPDK ‚Ä¢ In-depth knowledge of networking technologies, protocols and architectures, including L2/L3 switching, routing, load balancing and security ‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of networking protocols, including TCP/IP, BGP, OSPF, VLANs and VXLAN ‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of the configuration and operation of switches, routers, smart NICs and DPUs‚Ä¢ Knowledge of software-defined networking (SDN) concepts and architectures such as OpenFlow and OVSDB‚Ä¢ Knowledge of network testing and monitoring tools such as Spirent, Ixia ‚Ä¢ Knowledge of network emulation and simulation tools such as GNS3 and NS-3‚Ä¢ Experience with network testing tools such as Wireshark, tcpdump, ping, etc. ‚Ä¢ Experience with network automation and programmability using such tools as Ansible and REST APIs‚Ä¢ Knowledge of virtualization and containerization tools such as VirtualBox, Docker and Kubernetes‚Ä¢ Good understanding of CI/CD processes ‚Ä¢ Strong analytical and problem-solving skills ‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and collaboration skills with the ability to work effectively in a team

title: Python Developer
description: Product: We're building AI into messaging apps (whatsapp + telegram live already in beta). Base layer chatGPT - Custom Application Layer (i.e price feeds, real-time news, proactive features) - AVA in messaging apps. Workflow: We're remote with founders based in Netherlands and Czech Republic (most of the time), team members across world. title: Python Engineer
description: We are developing an innovative, conversational voice-based AI for the restaurant world.Its first skill is already being deployed at scale: automated order taking in Quick Service Restaurants (QSRs) where it improves customer experience, increases sales, and reduces employee stress.Our backend is developed all in Python running in the cloud over k8s.It's not a typical backend interacting with a UI frontend. It handles audio streams in real-time and runs our key AI algorithms.The role involves designing and implementing complex parts of the backend. This involves distributed architecture as well as concurrency while taking into consideration performance and scale. Requirements 5+ years experience in Python Experience in SW design and backend development Experience in developing and deploying multiple projects used in production Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Microservices, CI/CD, Clouds (AWS/GCP/Azure) BSc in Computer Science or equivalent industry experienceQualities: Star performer, Team player, Fast, Strong ownership, Passionate about their work, Great communicator.Bonus: Being an Architect with deep design experience. Experience with gRPC, Async IO, WebRTC. Experience with Ansible.Benefits20 paid vacation days10 paid sick daysholidays‚Äã

title: Senior Python Developer
description: Base Blocks tech is an outsourcing company that provides IT services for startups and growing businesses. Our clients are from the USA, Australia, New Zealand, and Europe. Our projects are mainly in Fintech, Ad-Teach, Medical, Education, and Green Energy spheres.We provide software design and engineering, product development, and technical consultancy services. The mission of Base Blocks tech is to help companies grow at a rapid pace, build high-quality solutions, focus on time to market, and follow lean software development principles.Who are we looking forWe would like to see a new team member that enjoys working with innovative clients as much as we are. Our team is friendly, respects each other, and is willing to help teammates in case of such a need. Thus we are looking for a person with the same values and vision.We are looking a highly motivated and experienced Python Backend Developer to join the team at BWEVENTSTECH, a fast-growing technology company specializing in event management software. The company works with Django on custom products and SaaS products that build.The company's clients are international businesses and market leaders: Twilio, Hilton, Eventhub, SreamYard, Swoogo, Google, and many others.At BW Events Tech, they know that their team is the greatest asset. With seasoned professionals all over the globe, they aim to provide the best insight and support to clients to have the best event experiences.Requirements:- 4+ years of experience in a similar position- Excellent knowledge of Python and Django- Strong understanding of architectural principles- Upper intermediate English level- Good communication skills and a strong desire to be a team player- Knowledge of AWS and Node.js would be a plus.Responsibilities:- Development of product- Design and architecture of APIs, backend logic and database architecture- Development of additional logic for the company's clients;- Taking part in the Agile process- Development of customizations for productWhat we offer- Interesting projects for outstanding companies- CEO that cares and supports for you to be successful in this position and grow to a next level- Culture of integrity, fast feedback, and transparency- Good compensation- Ability to grow through courses, conferences, etc which cost compensated by the company- Fully remote work- Performance review once in 6 months- Friendly empathic teamIf you meet the qualifications and are excited about this opportunity, please submit your resume.Apply now and join us in revolutionizing the event management industry!

title: Python/GoLang developer (Europe)
description: TEAM International invites a Python developer, who is also interested in Go, to join the Belgian hospitality project.Tech stack: Google Cloud, Kubernetes, Istio, Python, Django, GoLang, Bigtable, FoundationDB, Spanner.Role description:Get ready to take your skills to the next level and be part of an exciting team that's building new products and features from scratch. As a Python/Go Backend Engineer, you'll architect, code, and maintain high-performance microservices for our existing products and create new ones from scratch. You'll gain a high affinity with our complex datasets by crunching large amounts of data on the fly and processing them for use in API implementations.You'll also have the opportunity to take ownership of a piece of our codebase and infrastructure and find ways to improve it, both in terms of performance/efficiency and structure/best practices. And with extensive testing as part of your development process, you'll ensure high-quality deliverables that meet our customers' needs.As a valued member of our product scrum-teams, you'll play a crucial role in creating high-performing and efficient APIs that drive new feature developments and contribute to the success of our company. Join us and be part of a team that's making a real difference in the industry."Join our team of highly skilled engineers and contribute to the development of high-performance APIs that leverage terabytes of data to provide valuable insights for over 100,000 hotels worldwide.We are looking for:‚Ä¢	3+ years of professional experience in a similar position‚Ä¢	Experience writing Python and/or Go‚Ä¢	Experience with microservice architectures and any cloud platform (we work with GCP)‚Ä¢	A passion for efficiency and performance optimizations, preferably in the field of data processing and algorithm design‚Ä¢	Affinity with challenging status-quo of overall API design and architecture‚Ä¢	Proven experience dealing with large datasets in a NoSQL environment‚Ä¢	Fluent in English.We welcome:‚Ä¢	Fluency in SQL‚Ä¢	Knowledge of the Django framework‚Ä¢	Experience in working in a cross-functional team to develop and deliver new product features.Benefits:Being a part of TEAM International gives you the chance to work on challenging projects with great professionals, international clients, and the latest technologies.We have a great benefits package that includes:‚Ä¢ English lessons‚Ä¢ Private Health Insurance‚Ä¢ 20+ Vacation days‚Ä¢ Gym Bonus‚Ä¢ Education allowance.

title: Python Developer
description: Requirements:  Backend developer with 5+ years' experience in the financial or cryptocurrency industries.  Strong proficiency in at least one backend programming language, such as Python, Golang or Ruby on Rails.  Familiarity with RESTful API design and implementation.  Experience with version control systems, particularly Git.  Familiarity with containerization and deployment technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes and cloud computing platforms such as Amazon Web Services (AWS. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.  Strong attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality code in a timely manner Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, or related field.Key Responsibilities:  Designing, developing, and maintaining server-side applications and APIs for our Crypto Exchange platform  Integrating with external APIs to facilitate trading, transactions, and data retrieval. Implementing security protocols to ensure the protection of user data and the platform as a whole Writing efficient and scalable code that can handle large amounts of data and traffic.  Collaborating with the frontend development team to ensure seamless integration of server-side and client-side code.  Conducting code reviews and testing to ensure high quality and reliable code.  Staying up-to-date with industry trends and incorporating best practices in backend development.Preferred Qualifications: Experience developing for blockchain or decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms Understanding of front-end development technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Python Developer - work only from Poland
description: Project Description:We are currently seeking a skilled Python Developer to join client's Energy Trading team. The ideal candidate will work closely with traders to develop strategic solutions and provide ad-hoc support, using their expertise in Python, SQL, and reporting tools. A background in statistical modeling and experience with gas or power fundamental/price data is a plus.Responsibilities:- Collaborate with traders to understand their requirements and develop data-driven strategic solutions to support decision-making in energy trading.- Provide ad-hoc analytical support to traders by extracting, processing, and interpreting data.- Leverage knowledge of Python, particularly statistical/data manipulation/visualization libraries (such as pandas, numpy, scipy, and matplotlib), to analyze and interpret large datasets.- Utilize SQL / Redshift / S3 to query and manipulate data to meet specific requirements.- Create insightful reports and dashboards using Tableau, Plotly, Dash or other reporting tools.- Assist in the development and implementation of statistical models, linear optimizations, and machine learning algorithms to improve trading strategies.- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and developments in energy markets, particularly in gas and power fundamentals and price data.Mandatory Skills Description:- Minimum 3+ years of experience as Python developer- Strong knowledge of Python, particularly the statistical/data manipulation/visualization libraries (e.g., pandas, numpy, scipy, and matplotlib).- Proficiency in SQL, Redshift, or S3 for data querying and manipulation.- Experience in using reporting tools like Tableau, Plotly, Dash or other to create visually appealing and informative reports and dashboards.- Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced, high-pressure environment.- Very strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with traders and other team members.Nice-to-Have Skills:- Familiarity with statistical modeling, linear optimizations, and machine learning techniques.- Experience working with gas or power fundamental/price data, preferably in an energy trading context.- Knowledge of the energy industry and a solid understanding of market dynamics.

title: Senior Algorithms Developer (Speech Recognition, Python)
description: On behalf of Corsound AI, SD Solutions is looking for an Algorithm Developer to join the team!SD Solutions is a staffing company operating globally. Contact us to get more details about the benefits we offer.Responsibilities:Take part in designing the next generation of CorSound deep learning solutions and algorithmic engine.Research recent papers on the topicCarry out deep-learning experimentsExcel at both individual and teamworkRequirements:Excellent coding skills, with 3+ years of experience in Python.PhD in relevant disciplines (e.g., EE/CS/Applied Math/Physics/Bio Engineering/Computational Biology/etc.) - mandatoryBroad knowledge and former experience with image generation (GAN / diffusion models / VAE) - mandatoryFormer experience in Speaker Recognition or Speech Recognition fieldsBroad knowledge of algorithms and analysis tools and methodsExperience with DL frameworks, i.e., TensorFlow/PyTorch is mandatoryGreat advantages:Strong background in C++.Experience with the development of Machine Learning / Signal Processing applications - advantageAbout the company:CorSound AI disrupt security, safety, and intelligence sectors with innovative AI-powered solutions and are rapidly advancing opportunities in the medical and financial security industriesOur goal is to become a leading company in the field of personal recognition based on voice, and automated facial reconstruction based on sound/voice.We are using cutting-edge AI techniques to treat human voice using image processing techniques.Members of our algorithms team develop world-class speaker recognition and voice processing solutions that are on the biometric levels.

title: Middle Python Developer
description: WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FORWe are seeking a highly skilled mid-level Python Developer with 3 to 4 years of experience in Python development. The ideal candidate will have experience creating public APIs for third-party integrations, as well as working with Amazon Managed Services (AMS). The candidate should be a self-starter who is capable of working independently as well as in a team environment. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining our company's Python applications.ABOUT THE COMPANYWe are building a home for friend-to-friend betting. We will make betting a more social and healthier experience by building a platform that lets groups of mates, societies, and sports clubs play prediction games, sweepstakes, and drafts against each other.Millions of sports fans enjoy making predictions and placing bets against each other during sports events (of the 13.6 million bettors in the UK, 45% also have 'offline' bets against their mates), however often these bets or games are very manual in the way through spreadsheets and cash manually exchanged, often leaving a lot of admin and games dying out.We are building a platform that lets you:‚Ä¢ Create your own prediction game across multiple sports.‚Ä¢ Manages all the admin of running the game for you so you can concentrate on enjoying thesport.‚Ä¢ Support your sports club or good cause by donating a % of the prize pot from your league.Ultimately, we believe we are a challenger to traditional betting companies as players will get more of a buzz from beating their mates and have more social interaction about sporting events, however, this will be in a controlled manner they are held accountable by their mates and can't chase losses against a faceless bookmakers app.KEY RESPONSIBILITIES‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain Python applications.‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and deploy public APIs for third-party integrations.‚Ä¢ Develop documentation for APIs and other software projects.‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize software features and fixes.‚Ä¢ Write clean, scalable, and maintainable code.‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviews, debugging, and troubleshooting to maintain code quality.‚Ä¢ Develop test cases and automated tests to ensure high code coverage.‚Ä¢ Stay up to date with the latest trends and technologies in Python development. MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS‚Ä¢ 3 to 4 years of experience in Python development‚Ä¢ Experience creating public APIs for third-party integrations.‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of Python and its libraries‚Ä¢ Experience with web frameworks such as Django or Flask‚Ä¢ Experience with SQL databases such as MySQL or PostgreSQL‚Ä¢ Experience with version control systems such as Git‚Ä¢ Experience developing documentation for APIs and other software projects.‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail‚Ä¢ Strong communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related fieldNICE TO HAVE‚Ä¢ Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS‚Ä¢ Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes‚Ä¢ Experience with data processing technologies such as Apache SparkPERSON SPECIFICATION‚Ä¢ Enjoys coaching junior developers on the team.‚Ä¢ Adept at liaising with product owner/manager, external stakeholders‚Ä¢ Takes ownership of tasks‚Ä¢ Efficient with good time management skills‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills (English)‚Ä¢ Product development/ project management knowledge‚Ä¢ Excellent estimation skills‚Ä¢ Committed and willing to grow with the business
